titleStmt.title: The tribunall of the conscience: or, A treatise of examination shewing vvhy and how a Christian should examine his conscience, and take an account of his life. By Henry Mason, parson of St. Andrews Vndershaft, London.
titleStmt.author: Mason, Henry, 1573?-1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G[eorge] P[urslowe] for Iohn Clarke, and are to be sold at his shop, vnder St. Peters Church in Corne-hill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, vnder St. Peters Church in Corne-hill
